tool_description: REST API to check an IP address status via Project Honey Pot http:BL service.
name: httpbl
title: httpbl

api_list.name: IP
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://httpbl.p.rapidapi.com/ip/127.1.1.7"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "httpbl.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://httpbl.p.rapidapi.com/ip/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "httpbl.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
